author: Al Jazeera
title: Chechen leader, a Putin ally, says his forces deployed to Ukraine
description: Kadyrov says Chechen units had so far suffered no losses and Russian forces took large Ukrainian cities including Kyiv.
content: Ramzan Kadyrov, the leader of Russias Chechnya region and an ally of Russian President Vladimir Putin, has said Chechen fighters had been deployed in Ukraine, and he urged Ukrainians to overthrow theâ€¦ [+2698 chars]
